data.comment: The match is underway at Wanda Metropolitano.
Barcelona's Antoine Griezmann gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 3, Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards Atletico a goal kick.
Throw-in Barcelona.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Atletico.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Atletico.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 9, At Wanda Metropolitano, Koke has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
Marcos Llorente (Atletico) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 12, Barcelona have a goal kick.
Barcelona's Lionel Messi breaks free at Wanda Metropolitano. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
In the minute 16, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards the home team a throw-in.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Atletico in their own half.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Atletico.
Yannick Carrasco (Atletico) has received a yellow card from Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
In the minute 28, Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Can Barcelona capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a Atletico throw-in in Barcelona's half.
In the minute 34, Barcelona drive forward but Antoine Griezmann is judged offside.
Throw-in for Barcelona close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Atletico.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
Atletico are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Barcelona's Lionel Messi is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 42, Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ousmane Dembele for Barcelona is back on the field again.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Ousmane Dembele is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Yannick Carrasco is on target to give Atletico a 1-0 advantage.
The second-half is underway in Madrid.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
In the minute 48, Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a Barcelona throw-in in Atletico's half.
Atletico have a goal kick.
Ousmane Dembele for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 54, Atletico have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona push forward at Wanda Metropolitano and Clement Lenglet gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Atletico defence.
In the minute 57, Pedri (Barcelona) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
In the minute 57, Barcelona push upfield and Clement Lenglet gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Atletico defence.
Philippe Coutinho is on a sub for Pedri for Barcelona.
Koke (Atletico) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gerard Pique.
Ronald Koeman (Barcelona) has taken off Gerard Pique who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Sergino Dest is the replacement.
Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in Atletico.
Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Atletico.
Ousmane Dembele of Barcelona gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
In Madrid Barcelona attack through Miralem Pjanic. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
In the minute 71, Atletico to take a throw-in in Barcelona territory.
Barcelona needs to be cautious. Atletico have an attacking throw-in.
Yannick Carrasco for Atletico gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 73, Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards Barcelona a goal kick.
Diego Costa is replacing Marcos Llorente for the home team.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Free kick Barcelona.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Barcelona.
Stefan Savic is booked for the home team.
In the minute 80, Jose Gimenez (Atletico) has received a first yellow card.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 82, Antoine Griezmann (Barcelona) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ronald Koeman is making the team's third substitution at Wanda Metropolitano with Trincao replacing Antoine Griezmann.
In the minute 83, Ronald Koeman (Barcelona) is making a fourth substitution, with Martin Braithwaite replacing Miralem Pjanic.
In the minute 84, In Madrid, Atletico push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Atletico make their second substitution with Thomas Lemar replacing Joao Felix.
The home team replace Angel Correa with Geoffrey Kondogbia.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
In Madrid Atletico attack through Yannick Carrasco. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 86, Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards Barcelona a goal kick.
Trincao for Barcelona gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Atletico have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Important block from the Atletico defence as Sergi Roberto fires in a strike for Barcelona.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Atletico capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Barcelona's half?
Ball safe as Barcelona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Barcelona's Sergi Roberto is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Atletico in the half of Barcelona.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Atletico.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
The match has come to a close in Madrid. The final score is 1-0.
The home team have replaced Yannick Carrasco with Felipe. This is the fourth substitution made today by Diego Simeone.
The match at Wanda Metropolitano has been interrupted briefly for a check on Sergi Roberto, who is down injured.
